items.name: Bhindi Masala
items.description: A popular north Indian dish made with okra cooked in a tomato based sauce with a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Khatta Meetha Chicken
items.description: A flavorful Indian dish that combines sweet and tangy elements in a rich, spiced chicken curry. It's known for its balanced taste, achieved by using ingredients like raw mango slices for tangy flavour and ripe mango puree for sweetness and a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pinewheel Samosa
items.description: A savory Indian snack that features a spiced potato filling rolled into a flaky pastry dough, sliced and baked to create a pinwheel shape. (6 pieces)

items.name: Aloo Paratha
items.description: Wholewheat Indian flatbread stuffed with a mixture of mashed potato, chillies and spices. Served with achar and a side of onion-tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Banarasi Baigan Kalonji
items.description: A delicious dish featuring eggplants cooked with a blend of spices, nigella seeds (kalonji), which give it a unique flavor. The dish includes tomatoes, onions, and a mix of aromatic spices, creating a rich and flavorful curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rampuri Tara Gosht
items.description: A traditional Mughlai dish from Rampur, featuring succulent pieces of mutton cooked in a rich, aromatic gravy with a blend of spices and herbs. This dish is known for its robust flavors and tender meat, making it a regal and satisfying meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Papadi Chaat
items.description: A popular street food of India. Mini puris topped with mashed potato, onion, tomato, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy tamarind chutney, lots of sev and fresh coriander. A dish with a flavour bomb!

items.name: Litti Chokha
items.description: A traditional dish from the Indian state of Bihar. It consists of baked balls made of whole wheat flour and stuffed with a mixture of roasted gram flour, spices, and herbs and served with a side of mashed potatoes and eggplant, along with a tangy tomato and onion chutney.

items.name: Batata Vada Kadhi
items.description: A comforting Indian dish featuring crispy potato fritters (batata vada) served in a tangy and spiced yogurt-based curry (kadhi). This combination offers a delightful contrast of textures and flavors, making it a popular choice in Indian cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Khandeshi Lamb Curry
items.description: A spicy and flavorful dish from the Khandesh region of Maharashtra, India. It features tender mutton pieces cooked in a rich, aromatic gravy made with a special blend of local spices, creating a hearty and satisfying curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kanda Poha
items.description: A popular and light Indian breakfast dish made from flattened rice (poha) saut√©ed with onions (kanda), mustard seeds, turmeric, and green chilies. It's often garnished with fresh coriander, grated coconut, and a squeeze of lemon juice for added flavor.

items.name: Masala Bhaat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato, and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Veg dum Biryani
items.description: A popular Indian dish made with long-grain basmati rice and a mix of vegetables, flavored with aromatic spices and herbs, and slow-cooked in a sealed pot to allow the flavors to blend. Served with yogurt raita + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken 65 Biryani
items.description: Boneless chicken marinated with spices, lime juice and ginger garlic paste and deep fried. Cooked together with fragrant basmati rice and topped with mint, coriander and fried onions. Served with yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer or snack known for its spicy and flavorful taste. It is made with bite-sized pieces of chicken, marinated in a blend of spices such as red chili powder, turmeric, ginger-garlic paste, and other aromatic seasonings. The marinated chicken is then deep-fried until crispy and golden

items.name: Pudina Pulao
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish from North India. It is made with long-grain basmati rice cooked with a blend of aromatic spices and fresh mint leaves to create a refreshing and delicious flavor.

items.name: Chettinad Style Pepper Mushroom
items.description: A spicy South Indian dish from the Chettinad cuisine, featuring mushrooms cooked in a fiery and aromatic blend of freshly ground black pepper, curry leaves, and a variety of traditional spices. This dish is known for its robust flavors and peppery heat, making it a favorite among spice lovers.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Lamb Madras
items.description: A flavorful South Indian curry known for its rich, spicy, and aromatic sauce. It features tender lamb pieces cooked in a blend of tomatoes, onions, and a variety of spices including red chilies, cumin, and coriander, offering a robust and tangy taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Moong Dal Sundal
items.description: A South Indian snack made from cooked moong dal (split mung beans) tempered with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and other spices. It's often garnished with grated coconut and served as a nutritious and flavorful snack or side dish during festivals or as a light meal.

items.name: Ven Pongal
items.description: A savory and comforting South Indian breakfast dish made with rice, moong dal (lentil), and ghee

items.name: Lobia Ghassi
items.description: A flavorful Mangalorean curry made with black-eyed peas (lobia) cooked in a rich and aromatic coconut-based gravy. This vegetarian dish is spiced with a blend of traditional South Indian spices, making it delicious and hearty.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + salad + achar + papad

items.name: Prawns Ghee Roast
items.description: A dish from Mangalore with juicy prawns marinated in freshly blend fiery spice mix and cooked in ghee and curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Corn Bhaji
items.description: A tasty Indian street food snack made by mixing corn kernels with chickpea flour (besan), spices, and herbs to form a thick batter, which is then deep-fried until golden and crispy. (4 pieces)

items.name: Bisi Bele Bath
items.description: A popular and traditional dish from Karnataka. A combination of rice, lentils and vegetables cooked together with a special blend of spices which gives its unique flavor.

items.name: Chikad Chole
items.description: A traditional Punjabi dish where chickpeas (chole) simmered in a thick, spicy gravy made with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, and a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Murg Aur Nadir
items.description: A unique Kashmiri dish combining chicken (murg) with lotus stem (nadir). The dish is known for its rich, aromatic gravy made with traditional Kashmiri spices, offering a distinctive and delightful blend of flavors and textures.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Aloo Tikki
items.description: Boiled potatoes mashed and mixed with different spices, fresh coriander and shaped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with tomato ketchup. (4 tikki)

items.name: Paneer Paratha
items.description: Indian cottage cheese mixed with different spices and chilles stuffed inside whole wheat flatbread and cooked on a pan. Served with achar + yogurt. (2 parathas)

items.name: Kathal Biryani
items.description: Jackfruit cooked with a special spice blend and layered with partially cooked basmati rice, and then slow cooked in a pot, allowing the flavors to meld together with the rice. Served with a side of yogurt raita and papad.

items.name: Chameen Biryani
items.description: A unique and flavorful biryani variation with shrimp. It features layers of fluffy rice cooked with succulent pieces of shrimp, and a rich gravy infused with aromatic spices and coconut milk. Expect a delightful interplay of textures and a burst of flavor in every bite.

items.name: Aloo Chop
items.description: A popular snack from the Eastern region of India, particularly in West Bengal. It is made by coating boiled and mashed potatoes with a mixture of spices and breadcrumbs, and then deep-frying until crispy and golden brown. Served with a side of green chutney. (4 chop)

items.name: Kichuri
items.description: A flavorful dish made with rice, lentils, mixed vegetables, and aromatic spices.

items.name: Kashmiri Paneer Kalai
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri dish featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a rich, creamy gravy flavored with Kashmiri spices such as saffron, cardamom, and cloves. This dish is known for its luxurious texture and delicate flavors
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Lamb Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A delicious and aromatic rice dish that is popular in Indian and Pakistani cuisine. The dish is made with tender lamb that has been slow-cooked in a flavorful broth (yakhni) made with aromatic spices and yogurt. The lamb and yakhni are then combined with fragrant basmati rice and cooked until tender, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying meal. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Paneer Pakoda
items.description: A popular Indian snack made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that is coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to crispy perfection.

items.name: Veg Pulao
items.description: Mixed vegtables cooked with whole spices and teamed with fragant basmati rice, caramalised onion and cashew nuts. Served with papad.
